sZeroRecords:
Nope. There is nothing like that in the Bible!
Check your spelling or make sure you're searching
in the desired book or chapter.
For example: If you're searching for Moses in Genesis,
you'll get this message because the name ''Moses'
does not appear in Genesis.
On your left nav, at the top, you can reset all to search
the whole Bible, or just books, or just chapters
If you need help, feel free to ask the team at:
www.BibleFarm.org
